.. acknowledgement

This software is based upon work supported by the National Science Foundation under
Grant No. DMR-1409102. Example data, where indicated, was collected using the resources
of the Advanced Photon Source, a U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) Office of Science User 
Facility operated for the DOE Office of Science by Argonne National Laboratory under 
Contract No. DE-AC02-06CH11357.
